en_raw: "If no one can understand me, if I'm doomed to never be truly seen by another..."
en_clean: "If no one can understand me, if I'm doomed to never be truly seen by another..."

jp_clean: 「誰にも理解できないなら、他の人には本当の姿を見てもらえない運命にあるなら...」

en_clean: Talking to another self, to come to terms with what they've gone through...

en_raw: Sometimes, you just need a voice that answers back, Bonbon!
en_clean: Sometimes, you just need a voice that answers back, Bonbon!

jp_clean: 人は時に、返事してくれる声を必要とするんだよ、ボンボン！

en_raw: Hm...
en_clean: Hm...

en_raw: It would just be an echo chamber, though. You'd never get to any good conclusion, talking to yourself endlessly...
en_clean: It would just be an echo chamber, though. You'd never get to any good conclusion, talking to yourself endlessly...

jp_clean: 単なる反響音かもしれないがな。独り言を言っているだけでは、よい結論にたどり着けるわけがない...

en_raw: I suppose they felt so alone they saw no other recourse, though.
en_clean: I suppose they felt so alone they saw no other recourse, though.
